results.title: The local application of a 1% simvastatin gel improves bone regeneration in osteoporotic mandibular defects: a rat model study.
results.text_hl: The local application of a 1% @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ gel improves bone regeneration in @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008338 @@@osteoporotic mandibular defects@@@: a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model study.

citations.NLM: Ahmad K, Ali M, Muhammad S, Daoud A, Khalil A. The local application of a 1% simvastatin gel improves bone regeneration in osteoporotic mandibular defects: a rat model study. Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2025 Sep;87(9):5503-5511. PMID: 40901174

results.title: Core-Shell poly-(D,l-Lactide-co-Glycolide)-chitosan Nanospheres with simvastatin-doxycycline for periodontal and osseous repair.
results.text_hl: In experimental @DISEASE_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@ sites, SIM-DOX nanospheres significantly down-regulated IL-1b and MMP-8 and significantly reduced @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone loss@@@. In @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008338 @@@mandibular osseous defects@@@, @GENE_VEGFA @GENE_83785 @@@VEGF@@@ was up-regulated, and osteogenesis was significantly augmented with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ nanospheres treatment.

citations.NLM: Chang PC, Tai WC, Luo HT, Lai CH, Lin HH, Lin ZJ, Chang YC, Lee BS. Core-Shell poly-(D,l-Lactide-co-Glycolide)-chitosan Nanospheres with simvastatin-doxycycline for periodontal and osseous repair. Int J Biol Macromol. 2020 May 7;158():627-635. PMID: 32387616
citations.BibTeX: @article{32387616, title={Core-Shell poly-(D,l-Lactide-co-Glycolide)-chitosan Nanospheres with simvastatin-doxycycline for periodontal and osseous repair.}, author={Chang PC and Tai WC and Luo HT and Lai CH and Lin HH and Lin ZJ and Chang YC and Lee BS}, journal={Int J Biol Macromol}, volume={158}, pages={627-635}}
